name: DOCUMENT SERVICES
description: Under this service we are providing document delivery for both corporate and retail customers nationwide. Envelopes weighing between 01 to 200 grams are being serviced . These documents are being distributed vide 600+ outlets across Bangladesh

name: NON DOC/GIFT ITEM SERVICES
description: Items above 200 grams and less than or equal to 3.0 kgs which are not documents or parcels are identified as our Non-Documents (Gift item) delivery service. This is a product servicing our retail clients.

name: SUPER EXPRESS SERVICE
description: These are Extra urgent delivery documents in the companys list of enveloped services categories, under the "Super Express Service". In this Internet age, this is treated as the fastest and most secured delivery service for the valued special documents of retail and corporate customers.

name: DOCUMENT CORPORATE SERVICE
description: This service is provided to different corporate customers of Bangladesh. For example, banks, insurances, multinational companies, phone companies, factories, industries, garment factories etc. This service is provided against a set contract-based rate for all the products and services.

name: INTERNATIONAL SERVICE
description: undarban started their journey in the International sector quite some time ago to serve the nation. Now Sundarban is providing secured delivery support to about 220 countries Globally with online tracking facility and very competitive rates

name: OUTBOUND SERVICE
